name: Chinyere Asiegbu
review: ‘’  I have worked with lape on various projects and i find that she is not just a good designer but also a fighter, always eager to take on more challenges to improve herself. She takes constructive criticism in good faith and also interprets feedback well ‘’

name: Purevsuren Adiyasuren
review: ‘’ I had the pleasure of collaborating with Ojuolape. She is an incredibly fast learner who is adept at evaluating feedback from engineers and quickly solving problems. She has a keen eye for aesthetics, and her ability to create beautiful, colorful UI designs is simply outstanding. Her designs effectively capture the gaming feel and are a testament to her skill and creativity ‘’

name: Tracy Loisel
review: ‘’ Lape is a fighter, interpretes feedback very well ‘’
